About Us

We want our projects to meet our high requirements and desires of the customer, to be relevant and unique.

Décor color expert is a team of professionals who embody the most complex wishes of the customer into reality. We do not just do plaster work and provide wall painting services, but we create art that will delight your eye for many years and retain high quality.

Why Us?

High quality

The high quality of the completed projects and the grateful reviews of happy customers allow us to assert that wall decoration is our calling.

Top brand materials

We take care of the selection of materials. We work with brands such as Feidal, Spiver, Oikos, elf decor, San Marco

Work execution speed

We start working on your order immediately after the departure of a specialist to inspect the object.

Endless creative potential

Our team is not only cool specialists, but also creative creative people who know how to bring your ideas to life.
